item.title: Ulinx Technology
item.description:
Ulinx Technology develops various types of demo boards for teaching purposes. It is interested in collaborating with university faculty members in developing various types of instruction materials for lab experiments.

Platform: unknown; License: unknown

References: https://www.ulinx.com.tw/
item.author: dio

item.title: DMATEK
item.description:
DMATEK was dedicated in developing chip controllers and software which are widely used in industry 、schools 、and other areas, such as Intel MPU, CYPRESS USB PSOC, TI DSP.
Platform: unknown; License: unknown
Reference: https://www.dmatek.com.tw/en/tn/cn_1.asp
item.author: dio

item.title: OpenMoko
item.description:
Openmoko is a project to create a family of open source mobile phones, including the hardware specification and the operating system. The project was sponsored by Openmoko Inc. The first sub-project is Openmoko Linux, a Linux-based operating system designed for mobile phones, built using free software. The second sub-project is the development of hardware devices on which Openmoko Linux runs.
Platform: Mac, Linux, Windows; License: GPLv2 for all native applications
Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Openmoko
item.author: dio

item.title: First International Computer, Inc.
item.description:
First International Computer, Inc (FIC) provides partners an one-stop-shopping service which include designing, engineering and manufacturing services. FIC is a world leader in the design and production of motherboards, desktop PC, notebooks, mobile solutions and other electronic devices for over 28 years.
Platform: unknown; License: unknown
Reference: https://www.fic.com.tw/
item.author: dio

item.title: SafeNet
item.description:
SafeNet is a global leader in information security, protecting data at rest, data in motion, data in use, software and license management with the broadest range of security solutions in the world. The Company protects critical business data, communications, financial transactions, and digital identities through a full spectrum of encryption technologies.
Platform: unknown; License: unknown
Reference: https://www.safenet-inc.com/the-company/
item.author: dio

item.title: SiS
item.description:
Silicon Integrated Systems (SiS), founded in 1987, is a worldwide leader in the development of leading-edge core logic chipsets. Over the last 20 years, its products have been widely used in various applications such as Desktop PCs, notebook PCs, Embedded Systems, Wireless Communications, Servers, and Digital Entertainment Devices.
Platform: unknown; License: unknown
Reference: https://www.sis.com/aboutsis/aboutsis_index00.htm
item.author: dio

item.title: AEWIN Technologies Co.
item.description:
Founded in 2000, AEWIN Technologies Co., Ltd is an ISO-9001 certified designer and manufacturer of commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) and customized embedded computers for OEMs, ODMs, and system integrators. AEWIN products serve as platforms for a variety of different industrial and IT applications, with a focus on embedded and network security. AEWIN has gained worldwide recognition for providing high quality products and reliable service. In addition to platform-level products, AEWIN offers solutions for intelligent video surveillance as well. With headquarters in Taipei, Taiwan, two branches in Fremont, U.S.A. and Beijing, China and a distributor in Amerang, Germany. AEWIN is positioned to deliver responsive sales support, product planning and manufacturing.

Platform: unknown; License: unknown

Reference: https://www.aewin.com.tw/main/about.aspx?act=company
item.author: dio

item.title: ADLINK Technology, Inc.
item.description:
ADLINK endeavors to advance the technologies in the fields of test & measurement, applied computing and automation. We hope to provide superior quality and cost effective solution for our partners around the world.

item.author: dio

item.title: Advantech
item.description:
Founded in 1983, Advantech is a leader in providing trusted innovative embedded & automation products and solutions. Advantech offers comprehensive system integration, hardware, software, customer-centric design services, and global logistics support; all backed by industry-leading front and back office e-business solutions.

Platform: unknown; License: unknown

Reference: https://www.advantech.com/about/
item.author: dio

item.title: Superlink Technology Corporation
item.description:
Superlink Technology Corporation was founded in 1992 by a group of employees of Heighten Corporation, a very successful distributor of high quality electronic test instruments and computer products. Heighten distributed Tektronix product exclusively for over 30 years until Tektronix set up a branch office in Taiwan.

Platform: unknown; License: unknown

Reference: https://www.superlink.com.tw/superlink/brief%20english.html
item.author: dio
